ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TD-005/PSA-TD-003-089/Verify at the account level penalty calculation is rounding up/Positive
ns2:testcase.ns3:description: System must round up the penalty calculation decimal places, ,if Interest Rounding is set to "Round Up" at the product level.Example: Round Up: Indicates that the number will be rounded up to the required decimal points. For example, if the number is 2.131 and rounding has to be done to two decimal points, the number will be rounded up to 2.14. Likewise, 2.139 will also be rounded up to 2.14. Success Criteria: System rounds up the penalty calculation decimal places
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070382
